caption.p: Adaptive T cell responses to microbes.

T helper (T H) cell responses to microbial antigens presented by antigen-presenting cells (APCs), their cytokine milieu and role in driving the subsequent T-cell responses that are involved in protection against bacteria, fungi and parasites.
